hero.subtitle: Build the Future. Code Innovation. Transform Ideas into Reality.

about.heading: About Hackathon Nova
paragraphs: Hackathon Nova 2026 is Nepal's premier student-led technology innovation challenge, bringing together the brightest minds to solve real-world problems through cutting-edge technology. This 48-hour coding marathon is where ideas transform into impactful solutions.

Organized by the Computer Association of Pokhara Engineering College (CAPEC) and Information Technology Engineering Club - PEC (ITEC-PEC), this national-level hackathon provides a platform for students, developers, and innovators to showcase their skills, learn from industry Co-ordinators, and compete for exciting prizes.

codeOfConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfConduct.description: Guidelines for a safe, inclusive, and productive hackathon environment.
codeOfConduct.content: CAPEC Hackathon 2026 is dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form and expect all attendees to help create a welcoming environment.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.content: Welcome address, workshops, hacking period, mentoring sessions, and final demos across the 48-hour event.
